Class ZStyledText.LineInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • g4p_controls.ZStyledText.LineInfo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<ZStyledText.LineInfo>
    Enclosing class:
    ZStyledText

    public static class ZStyledText.LineInfo
extends Object
implements Comparable<ZStyledText.LineInfo>
    Class to hold information about a text layout. This class helps simplify the algorithms needed for multi-line text.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
